description.brief: Package for commanding the EtherDrive motor controller/driver

package.description:
This package interfaces to the EtherDrive motor controller/driver. The package communicates with the EtherDrive module via UDP. For more information see:
http://hubbard.engr.scu.edu/embedded/motorcontrol/etherdrive/v20/
package.author: Jeremy Leibs (email: leibs@willowgarage.com)
